name: Magic Chess: Bang Bang
description:
A thrilling real-time auto-chess strategy game with a magical twist - Magic Chess: Bang Bang, is coming! It opens a new world for you, where heroes are transformed into chess pieces. Purchase your hero chess pieces in the random hero pool for each round and form your own lineups! Moreover, you can upgrade your hero within the ‘Hero-star system’. Eight players in each match vie for the winning spot in a grand 1V1 finale battle!

Now come join us in the battlefield of Magic Chess: Bang Bang!

Game Features:

1. Auto-Play Chess
Buy your chess pieces and place them onto the battlefield. They will then auto-battle! Enjoy the intense battles with glorious skill effects!

2. Various Strategies
11 species, 10 classes, and over 50 exciting heroes to choose from.
You decide on your different lineup to strategically counter your opponents!

3. Hero Star-Raising System
You can upgrade the same heroes into higher-star ones, and also unlock their secret powers. In each match, all players share the same random hero pool, which is waiting to be discovered!

4. Classic Survival Gameplay
In classic auto-chess matches, 8 players use different heroes to compete for the championship. Heroes of different classes and species counter each other. So know your heroes as well as your opponents’!

5. Global Players
This game offers a platform where you can compete with players globally, regardless of location!

6. Fair and Real-Time MOBA
In Magic Chess: Bang Bang, there is no hero training or paying for stats. All you need are good strategies and luck. So test your wits and may good fortune bestow upon you now!

PLEASE NOTE! Magic Chess: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Magic Chess: Bang Bang.
